National Geographic Kids Chapter books pick up where the best-selling National
    Geographic Readers series leaves off, offering young animal lovers who are ready for short chapters lively, true stories that are inviting and easy to read. 
    
    These books are written in simple prose appropriate to kids just reading on their own. Featuring full-color, the high adventure series features plot-driven true stories packed with humorous tales and weird-but-true facts sprinkled throughout. Novel sized, they are perfect for backpacks, sharing with friends, and reading under the covers.

best_book.title: National Geographic Kids Chapters: Hoops to Hippos!: True Stories of a Basketball Star on Safari

series.title: Everything
series.description: The National Geographic Kids Everything, series breathes new life into the reference category, with fresh, dynamic, and fun presentations of the nonfiction subjects kids love most. Bursting with colorful photographs and packed with facts and tantalizing anecdotes from real experts, these lively books give kids an exciting way to absorb everything they want to know about a subject, whether they are driven by intense interest or new curiosity or both!
